item.title: Swedish vs Deep Tissue – Which Massage Do I Need?
item.description: Not sure whether to book Swedish or deep tissue? Learn the difference, who each style is best for, and how to choose the right massage for your body.
item.content:encoded:
If you’ve ever stared at a menu wondering whether you need Swedish or deep tissue massage, you’re not alone. Both are full-body treatments, but they work at different depths and have different goals.

  • Swedish massage – gentle, flowing strokes to relax the nervous system, improve circulation, and melt away everyday stress.
  • Deep tissue massage – slower, more focused pressure aimed at stubborn tightness, knots, and chronic tension in the muscles.

As a simple rule: choose Swedish for general relaxation, jet lag, or post-work stress. Choose deep tissue if you have intense muscle tightness, long hours at a desk, or nagging shoulder and back pain.

Our therapists at Seven Angels Massage (SAM) can also blend both styles in one session, so you get soothing relaxation where you need it and deeper work where it matters.

item.title: Hotel Outcall Massage – What to Expect
item.description: First time booking a hotel outcall massage in Manila or Makati? Here’s a simple walkthrough of how it works – from booking to checkout.
item.content:encoded:
A hotel outcall massage brings the spa straight to your room, so you never have to fight traffic or queue for an appointment. Perfect after flights, events, or long workdays.

  1. Book your session – choose your hotel, room number, time, and preferred massage style.
  2. Therapist arrival – your therapist arrives discreetly with the essentials, confirms your details, and sets up quickly so you can relax.
  3. Session flow – you enjoy your chosen treatment in the comfort of your own room, with the freedom to shower and rest right after.

With Seven Angels Massage (SAM), all sessions are handled by professional, trained therapists who respect your privacy, time, and hotel rules – so your only job is to relax.

item.title: Best Times to Book a Mobile Massage in Makati
item.description: Planning a massage around Makati’s traffic and your schedule? Discover the best times of day to book a mobile massage for maximum calm and minimal hassle.
item.content:encoded:
Makati never really sleeps – but your body still needs rest. Choosing the right time to book a mobile massage can make the difference between a rushed session and a deeply restorative one.

  • Early evenings – perfect after work, before dinner or drinks, while traffic calms down.
  • Late nights – ideal for post-shift workers, BPO schedules, and guests heading into a reset day.
  • Weekday off-peak hours – quieter building hallways and faster therapist travel times.

At Seven Angels Massage (SAM), we operate 24/7, so you can schedule a session when it fits your energy, your work cycle, and Makati’s traffic life.
